alert.note: Alert for Adams (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 1:57AM CDT until July 23 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Adams County in south central Nebraska... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 157 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Juniata, or 10 miles west of Hastings, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Juniata around 205 AM CDT. Roseland around 210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Ayr. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
